div.p: SPERMACOCE, button-wood, in botany: A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of tetrandria, and order of monogynia ; and in the natural ſyſtem arranged under the 47th order, st ellatae. The corolla is monopetalous and funnel-ſhaped, and there are two bidentate ſeeds. The ſpecies are eight, tenuior, verti- cillata, hirta, articularis, ſtricta, hiſpida, procumbens, and ſpinoſa.
